PR Should be named with conventional commits format:

<type>[optional scope](#{Issue Number}): <description>

For Example:

fix[SCREEN](#23): Centered question content

- Types of conventional commits can follow angular convention. More info here: https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/#summary
- Scope, while optional, is highly encouraged and should be included when appropriate. Scope can be for general (UI, DATABASE, etc..) or specific feature names.
- Short description should include key words.
